title: Gluten free apple pancakes
ingredients: ['2 eggs', '80ml apple sauce', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '60g almond flour or ground almonds', '45g tapioca flour', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 pinch salt', '3 tablespoons water, or as needed', '1 1/2 teaspoons coconut oil, or as needed']
